translations: v.叫喊（yell 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: My yelling and scolding didn't have much effect, but the swinging coat did.
sentences.translation: 我的叫喊和斥骂没有多少效果，但左右横扫的外套起了作用。

sentences.sentence: Turning toward the audience, he pointed to the rear of the orchestra, yelling wildly at the same time: "Look, look!"
sentences.translation: 他转向观众，指着乐队的后方，同时疯狂地大喊：“看，看！”

sentences.sentence: Openly displaying annoyance or anger, yelling, arguing loudly and so forth is considered ill-mannered in countries such as Japan.
sentences.translation: 在日本等国家，公开表达不满或愤怒、大喊大叫、大声吵闹等被视为不礼貌的行为。
